name: corruption in the dark
description:
[UPDATE]

JUST ADDED SFX

in this game you play a small square your goal is to guide yourself through a living maze of corruption towards the light. The corruption will grow in the dark and will only impact you as it comes into your light, just as real life corruption spreads without us having any say and only receiving the impact.

mechanics

use WASD or arrows to move

reaching the light boosts your score and also  clears all the corruption in the maze
